nodes.text: Hood family "Bespinian best" ice cream was a brand of ice cream from the planet of Bespin. The flavors it made included denta bean, Trammistan chocolate and beebleberry. The Besalisk cook Dexter Jettster used Hood family brand ice cream in his Neuvian sundaes served in Dex's Diner on the planet of Coruscant.
Hood family "Bespinian best" ice cream is a reference to Willrow Hood, otherwise known as "ice cream maker guy."
